TopicTitle: Xbox flight control left joystick mapping for aircraft

Articles.Content: Is there anyway to change the flight controls that are mapped to the left joystick?  I started playing this a few months back on my Xbox(never played the pc version) and I’m struggling to fly anything with wings.  Right now pitch and yaw are on the joystick, roll on the triggers which for control of rockets is fine, but flying an aircraft is just painful this way. Is there a setting that maps pitch and roll to the joystick and yaw to the triggers?  I’ve tried what I think might impact it but documentation for the consoles is not really helpful and nothing tried seems to make it better..
@Dew169, there is no way to fix this. However you will get used to it after a while.
